Package ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IEditGraphEventListener
    The listener interface for receiving edit events on a IEditGraphObservable instance.
    IEditGraphObservable
    This interface provides support for adding IEditGraphEventListener listeners to an instance of IGravisGraph.
    IGravisGraph
    This interface extends the JUNG Graph interface and adds some additional methods.
    IRestrictedGraph
    A restricted graph gives restricted access to the vertices and edges.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EditGraphDecorator
    This implementation of the IEditGraphObservable interface decorates a graph of type IGravisGraph.
    GraphFactory
    The static factory methods in this class create graph instances of different types.
    GraphIOManager
    IO-operations with graphs.
    GravisGraph
    This implementation of the IGravisGraph interface decorates a graph of type Graph.
    GravisGraphMLWriter
    Writes graphs out in GraphML format.
    RestrictedGraph
    This implementation of the IRestrictedGraph interface decorates a graph of type IGravisGraph.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IEditGraphEventListener.Type
    The different types of edit events.
